video.title: Fairy Tail
video.synopsis: When four young wizards team up to take jobs across the kingdom, they forge a bond more powerful than any magic and grow stronger with every mission.

episodes.synopsis: When a phony wizard lures Lucy onto his ship with the promise of getting into the guild of her dreams, her new friends arrive to bail her out.
episodes.title: The Fairy Tail

episodes.synopsis: For Lucy's first assignment, she braves Mt. Hakobe with her new friends Natsu and Happy to find a missing wizard.
episodes.title: Fire Dragon, Monkey, and Bull

episodes.synopsis: Natsu picks up a job that could pay big money but needs a certain type of girl to complete his plan -- and Lucy fills the bill perfectly.
episodes.title: Infiltrate the Everlue Mansion

episodes.synopsis: Natsu, Lucy and Happy will have to do more than just read between the lines to defeat the twisted Duke Everlue and his monstrous maid, Virgo.
episodes.title: Dear Kaby

episodes.synopsis: Erza asks Gray and Natsu to form a team with her to stop a corrupt guild from using a dark magic that has the power to kill everyone in Fiore.
episodes.title: The Wizard in Armor

episodes.synopsis: Erza's team chases Erigor and his guild to a train station. Can Fairy Tail's strongest team snuff the death flute before its spell hits the airwaves?
episodes.title: Fairies in the Wind

episodes.synopsis: The wizards are sitting ducks behind Erigor's impenetrable wind wall until Happy hatches a plan -- with a little help from the stars.
episodes.title: Flame and Wind

episodes.synopsis: Natsu knocks the wind out of Erigor's sails, but Fairy Tail's strongest team still has a war to fight when the death flute plays an evil scale.
episodes.title: The Strongest Team

episodes.synopsis: Heading home with empty bellies, the team happens upon a deserted village with lots of grub lying around -- but Erza's gut tells her something is up.
episodes.title: Natsu Devours a Village

episodes.synopsis: It's time for Erza to meet Natsu's challenge. Before things get heated, the Guild Council arrests Erza, but Natsu won't let her get away that easily!
episodes.title: Natsu vs. Erza

episodes.synopsis: Natsu, Happy and Lucy tread some troubled waters when they break guild rules and end up shipwrecked on the cursed island of Galuna.
episodes.title: The Cursed Island

episodes.synopsis: When the team stumbles upon the infamous demon Deliora frozen in ice, cold memories -- and a familiar face -- are resurrected from Gray's dark past.
episodes.title: Moon Drip

episodes.synopsis: With a defeated Gray in tow, Natsu races Lyon's pawns back to the village just in time to repel poisonous goo delivered by a giant flying rodent.
episodes.title: Natsu vs. Yuka the Wave User

episodes.synopsis: When Lucy cooks up a plan to defeat a doll master wizard who's on a power trip, one or both of them will soon be all washed up.
episodes.title: Just Do Whatever!!

episodes.synopsis: Gray cuts a path to the ruins to put the freeze on Lyon -- who plans to release the indomitable monster Deliora.
episodes.title: Eternal Magic

episodes.synopsis: Face to face with his childhood rival, Gray is willing to do anything -- even use Iced Shell -- to stop Lyon from melting the ice to free Deliora.
episodes.title: The Final Showdown on Galuna Island

episodes.synopsis: Natsu spoils the masked wizard's plans to use Deliora. Meanwhile, Erza prepares to take down the purple moon looming over the island.
episodes.title: Burst

episodes.synopsis: In full gear, Erza -- with the help of Natsu's firepower -- launches her lance at the sky to shatter the spell and restore the villagers' memories.
episodes.title: Reach the Sky Above

episodes.synopsis: Natsu absent-mindedly reads a spell that swaps the minds, bodies and magic of everyone nearby.
episodes.title: Changeling

episodes.synopsis: Mirajane tells Lucy the story of how Natsu found Happy as an egg and fought tooth and nail to hatch it so he could raise his own dragon.
episodes.title: Natsu and the Dragon Egg

episodes.synopsis: When a member of the Phantom Lord guild wrecks Fairy Tail headquarters and attacks Makarov's wizard children, he declares war between the guilds.
episodes.title: The Phantom Lord

episodes.synopsis: As Natsu goes head to head with Gajeel, the destruction is interrupted when Natsu learns that Lucy has been kidnapped, which sends him over the edge.
episodes.title: Lucy Heartfilia

episodes.synopsis: Fairy Tail regroups to plan their next move. But when Jose returns with a cannon capable of blasting the guild to bits, their time to act ticks down.
episodes.title: 15 Minutes

episodes.synopsis: Natsu's fists are used against him in a face-off with a fellow fire wizard. Meanwhile, a member of Phantom Lord's Element 4 puts Elfman in a bind.
episodes.title: To Keep from Seeing Those Tears

episodes.synopsis: Elfman unleashes the dangerous full-body beast mode to pummel Sol. Meanwhile, Natsu wages war against the wind wizard, and Juvia melts over Gray.
episodes.title: A Flower Blooms in the Rain

episodes.synopsis: Natsu struggles against the strongest of the Element 4 -- but a surprise blow from an armor-switching warrior knocks the wind out of Aria.
episodes.title: Wings of Flame

episodes.synopsis: A scary Natsu tests his mettle against the iron-scaled Gajeel but loses steam when there isn't anything around to fuel his firepower.
episodes.title: The Two Dragon Slayers

episodes.synopsis: As Jose is moments from crushing Erza, extreme powers collide when Fairy Tail's fearsome leader makes a blinding return to burn out Phantom Lord.
episodes.title: Fairy Law

episodes.synopsis: After a heated chat, Natsu and Gajeel share a dragon-related revelation. Meanwhile, Lucy is nowhere to be found when her friends drop by for a visit.
episodes.title: My Resolve

episodes.synopsis: When Fairy Tail's strongest team takes the stage with a production for a foundering theater, a casting change causes trouble.
episodes.title: Next Generation

episodes.synopsis: Loke is smooth with the ladies, but Lucy seems to be his kryptonite. Irked by his odd conduct, Lucy looks into his past and learns a startling secret.
episodes.title: A Star Removed from the Sky

episodes.synopsis: Loke shares his unsettling story with Lucy. Refusing to let her friend fade away, Lucy challenges the authority of the almighty ruler of the skies!
episodes.title: Celestial Spirit King

episodes.synopsis: The team kicks back at a luxurious resort, but the vacation is cut short when a crew of rogues catches the wizards with their collective guard down.
episodes.title: The Tower of Heaven

episodes.synopsis: Natsu and the crew track the kidnappers to the Tower of Heaven, where a demented figure from Erza's past plans to activate a devastating magic.
episodes.title: Jellal

episodes.synopsis: To stop Jellal from releasing horrors upon the world, Erza has no choice but to fight her former friend.
episodes.title: Voice of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Temporarily declawed when he gets stuck in some stubborn headgear, Natsu uses his dome to defeat a kitty-loving baddie.
episodes.title: Heaven's Game

episodes.synopsis: With one sick riff, a metalhead transforms Juvia into his freaky slave and turns her against Lucy. Elsewhere, a birdbrained rocketeer devours Natsu.
episodes.title: Armor of the Heart

episodes.synopsis: Erza slices through a samurai showdown and heads straight for Jellal. Can she defeat him before the council fires the destructive Etherion beam?
episodes.title: Destiny

episodes.synopsis: As Jellal's plan falls into place, Erza is about to lose her body to resurrect Zeref. Hope seems lost unless her fire-breathing friend can save her.
episodes.title: Give Our Prayers to the Sacred Light

episodes.synopsis: Natsu works on wrecking the tower. Knowing that the remains are unstable and may explode, Erza takes one for the team.
episodes.title: Titania Falls

episodes.synopsis: Erza says farewell to old friends, and the strongest Fairy Tail team returns home to a bevy of surprises -- including a bigger and better guild hall.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: At the Miss Fairy Tail beauty pageant, the guild is shocked as the contenders turn stone cold when a menacing member returns to start a new contest.
episodes.title: Battle of Fairy Tail

episodes.synopsis: Makarov and Natsu are sitting ducks while the other wizards battle one another to exhaustion. Meanwhile, Laxus taunts the guild master with blackmail.
episodes.title: Defeat Your Friends to Save Your Friends

episodes.synopsis: After Erza takes on Evergreen, Laxus sends the guild a high-voltage threat. As the wizards search for the bully, creepy dolls ambush Lucy and Happy.
episodes.title: Thunder Palace

episodes.synopsis: Just when it seems Lucy is out of luck, her most defiant -- and amorous -- celestial spirit saves her from death by dollies.
episodes.title: Advent of Satan

episodes.synopsis: As the Raijin Tribe is defeated, time is ticking away for Fairy Tail to stop the Thunder Palace from frying the entire city.
episodes.title: Clash at Kardia Cathedral!

episodes.synopsis: After a telepathic pep talk, the Fairy Tail wizards put aside their silly quarrels to help Erza take down the Thunder Palace.
episodes.title: Triple Dragons

episodes.synopsis: The wrath of Laxus takes a shocking turn, and a resilient fire-breather takes one last stand to stop the war.
episodes.title: Fantasia
